trans-unit.source: Install Update 1 on your StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Install Update 1 on your StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Explains how to install StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1 on your device.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to install StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1 on your device.

trans-unit.source: Install Update 1 on your StorSimple device
trans-unit.target: Install Update 1 on your StorSimple device

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This tutorial explains how to install Update 1 on a StorSimple device that is running a software version prior to Update 1.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial explains how to install Update 1 on a StorSimple device that is running a software version prior to Update 1.

trans-unit.source: Your device could be running the generally available (GA) release, Update 0.1, Update 0.2, or Update 0.3 software.
trans-unit.target: Your device could be running the generally available (GA) release, Update 0.1, Update 0.2, or Update 0.3 software.

trans-unit.source: During this installation, if your device is running a version prior to Update 1, then checks are performed on your device.
trans-unit.target: During this installation, if your device is running a version prior to Update 1, then checks are performed on your device.

trans-unit.source: These checks determine the device health in terms of hardware state and network connectivity.
trans-unit.target: These checks determine the device health in terms of hardware state and network connectivity.

trans-unit.source: You will be prompted to perform a manual pre-check to ensure that:
trans-unit.target: You will be prompted to perform a manual pre-check to ensure that:

trans-unit.source: The controller fixed IPs are routable and can connect to the Internet.
trans-unit.target: The controller fixed IPs are routable and can connect to the Internet.

trans-unit.source: These IPs are used to service updates to your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: These IPs are used to service updates to your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: You can test this by running the following cmdlet on each controller:
trans-unit.target: You can test this by running the following cmdlet on each controller:

trans-unit.source: Test-Connection -Source -Destination
trans-unit.target: Test-Connection -Source -Destination

trans-unit.source: Sample output for Test-Connection when fixed IPs can connect to the Internet
trans-unit.target: Sample output for Test-Connection when fixed IPs can connect to the Internet

trans-unit.source: Before updating the device, we recommend that you take a cloud snapshot of the device data.
trans-unit.target: Before updating the device, we recommend that you take a cloud snapshot of the device data.

trans-unit.source: After you have verified and acknowledged the manual checks (above), a set of automatic pre-update checks will be performed.
trans-unit.target: After you have verified and acknowledged the manual checks (above), a set of automatic pre-update checks will be performed.

trans-unit.source: These include:
trans-unit.target: These include:

trans-unit.source: Controller health checks to verify that both the device controllers are healthy and online.
trans-unit.target: Controller health checks to verify that both the device controllers are healthy and online.

trans-unit.source: Hardware component health checks to verify that all the hardware components on your StorSimple device are healthy.
trans-unit.target: Hardware component health checks to verify that all the hardware components on your StorSimple device are healthy.

trans-unit.source: DATA 0 checks to verify that DATA 0 is enabled on your device.
trans-unit.target: DATA 0 checks to verify that DATA 0 is enabled on your device.

trans-unit.source: If this interface is not enabled, you will need to enable it and then retry.
trans-unit.target: If this interface is not enabled, you will need to enable it and then retry.

trans-unit.source: DATA 2 and DATA 3 checks to verify that DATA 2 and DATA 3 network interfaces are not enabled.
trans-unit.target: DATA 2 and DATA 3 checks to verify that DATA 2 and DATA 3 network interfaces are not enabled.

trans-unit.source: If these interfaces are enabled, then you will need to disable them and then try to update your device.
trans-unit.target: If these interfaces are enabled, then you will need to disable them and then try to update your device.

trans-unit.source: This check is performed only if you are updating from a device running GA software.
trans-unit.target: This check is performed only if you are updating from a device running GA software.

trans-unit.source: Devices running versions 0.1, 0.2, or 0.3 will not need this check.
trans-unit.target: Devices running versions 0.1, 0.2, or 0.3 will not need this check.

trans-unit.source: Gateway check on any device running a version prior to Update 1.
trans-unit.target: Gateway check on any device running a version prior to Update 1.

trans-unit.source: This check is performed only on devices that have a gateway configured for a network interface other than DATA 0.
trans-unit.target: This check is performed only on devices that have a gateway configured for a network interface other than DATA 0.

trans-unit.source: Update 1 will only be applied if all the pre-update checks are successfully completed.
trans-unit.target: Update 1 will only be applied if all the pre-update checks are successfully completed.

trans-unit.source: After you have applied Update 1 on your StorSimple device, future updates will not have the Data 2 and Data 3 checks and the Gateway check.
trans-unit.target: After you have applied Update 1 on your StorSimple device, future updates will not have the Data 2 and Data 3 checks and the Gateway check.

trans-unit.source: The other pre-checks will occur.
trans-unit.target: The other pre-checks will occur.

trans-unit.source: Use the Management Portal to install Update 1
trans-unit.target: Use the Management Portal to install Update 1

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you use the Azure Management Portal to update a device that is running the GA version.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you use the Azure Management Portal to update a device that is running the GA version.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to update your device.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to update your device.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting update failures
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting update failures

trans-unit.source: What if you see a notification that the pre-upgrade checks have failed?
trans-unit.target: What if you see a notification that the pre-upgrade checks have failed?

trans-unit.source: If a pre-check fails, make sure that you have looked at the detailed notification bar at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: If a pre-check fails, make sure that you have looked at the detailed notification bar at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: This provides guidance as to which pre-check has failed.
trans-unit.target: This provides guidance as to which pre-check has failed.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an instance in which such a notification appears.
trans-unit.target: The following illustration shows an instance in which such a notification appears.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the controller health check and hardware component health check have failed.
trans-unit.target: In this case, the controller health check and hardware component health check have failed.

trans-unit.source: Under the Hardware Status section, you can see that both Controller 0 and Controller 1 components need attention.
trans-unit.target: Under the Hardware Status section, you can see that both Controller 0 and Controller 1 components need attention.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Pre-check failure</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Pre-check failure</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You will need to make sure that both controllers are healthy and online.
trans-unit.target: You will need to make sure that both controllers are healthy and online.

trans-unit.source: You will also need to make sure that all the hardware components in the StorSimple device are shown to be healthy on the Maintenance page.
trans-unit.target: You will also need to make sure that all the hardware components in the StorSimple device are shown to be healthy on the Maintenance page.

trans-unit.source: You can then try to install updates.
trans-unit.target: You can then try to install updates.

trans-unit.source: If you are not able to fix the hardware component issues, then you will need to contact Microsoft Support for next steps.
trans-unit.target: If you are not able to fix the hardware component issues, then you will need to contact Microsoft Support for next steps.

trans-unit.source: What if you receive a "Could not install updates" error message, and the recommendation is to refer to the update troubleshooting guide to determine the cause of the failure?
trans-unit.target: What if you receive a "Could not install updates" error message, and the recommendation is to refer to the update troubleshooting guide to determine the cause of the failure?

trans-unit.source: One likely cause for this could be that you do not have connectivity to the Microsoft Update servers.
trans-unit.target: One likely cause for this could be that you do not have connectivity to the Microsoft Update servers.

trans-unit.source: This is a manual check that needs to be performed.
trans-unit.target: This is a manual check that needs to be performed.

trans-unit.source: If you lose connectivity to the update server, your update job would fail.
trans-unit.target: If you lose connectivity to the update server, your update job would fail.

trans-unit.source: You can check the connectivity by running the following cmdlet from the Windows PowerShell interface of your StorSimple device:
trans-unit.target: You can check the connectivity by running the following cmdlet from the Windows PowerShell interface of your StorSimple device:

trans-unit.source: Test-Connection -Source -Destination
trans-unit.target: Test-Connection -Source -Destination

trans-unit.source: Run the cmdlet on both controllers.
trans-unit.target: Run the cmdlet on both controllers.

trans-unit.source: If you have verified the connectivity exists, and you continue to see this issue, please contact Microsoft Support for next steps.
trans-unit.target: If you have verified the connectivity exists, and you continue to see this issue, please contact Microsoft Support for next steps.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Learn more about <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure StorSimple</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: Learn more about <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure StorSimple</linkText><title></title></link>
